members.joinCircumstances: Officially joined after Arlong Park Arc

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Skypiea
keyMoments.description: The entire Straw Hat crew successfully reaches the legendary sky island of Skypiea, beginning a new chapter in their Grand Line adventure.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the crew's entry into one of the most challenging and mysterious arcs of their journey, testing their resolve and abilities in an entirely new environment.

keyMoments.title: Meeting Conis
keyMoments.description: The crew meets their first friendly Skypiean resident, Conis, who warmly welcomes them despite them being strangers from the Blue Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's first alliance in Skypiea and shows their ability to make friends wherever they go.

keyMoments.title: Nami Masters the Waver
keyMoments.description: Nami demonstrates the crew's adaptability by immediately mastering waver riding, a skill that typically requires ten years of practice.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the exceptional talents within the crew and foreshadows their ability to overcome Skypiea's unique challenges.

ships.description: The Straw Hats' beloved caravel ship that successfully made the journey to Skypiea

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
